import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import Sidebar from '../../layouts/Blogsidebar'; import blogbanner from '../../../assets/img/blog-details/01.jpg'; import blogbanner2 from '../../../assets/img/blog-details/02.jpg'; import icon from '../../../assets/img/blog-details/icon.png'; import author from '../../../assets/img/blog-details/author.jpg'; import comment1 from '../../../assets/img/blog-details/avatar-1.jpg'; import comment2 from '../../../assets/img/blog-details/avatar-2.jpg'; import comment3 from '../../../assets/img/blog-details/avatar-3.jpg'; import img1 from '../../../assets/img/blog-details/03.jpg'; import img2 from '../../../assets/img/blog-details/04.jpg'; // tags const tagspost = [ { tag: 'Popular' }, { tag: 'desgin' }, { tag: 'ux' }, ]; // Social share const socialshare = [ { url: '#', icon: 'fab fa-facebook-f' }, { url: '#', icon: 'fab fa-twitter' }, { url: '#', icon: 'fab fa-medium' }, { url: '#', icon: 'fab fa-google-plus-g' }, { url: '#', icon: 'fab fa-tumblr' }, ]; // Related post const relatedpost = [ { img: img1, date: '24th March 2020', title: 'A series of iOS 7 inspire vector icons sense.', text: 'Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, conse ctet ur adipisicing elit, sed doing.' }, { img: img2, date: '24th March 2020', title: 'A series of iOS 7 inspire vector icons sense.', text: 'Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, conse ctet ur adipisicing elit, sed doing.' }, ]; class Content extends Component { render() { return (
